articles.title: iPhone 15 Pro, Pro Max available on Flipkart with big discounts - India Today
articles.description: Flipkart is running an End of Season sale event and is offering discounts on iPhone 14 Plus, iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Pro, and more.
articles.content: Similarly, the iPhone 15 Pro Max is selling on Flipkart at Rs 1,48,900, which is lower than the launch price of Rs Rs 1,59,900.
